text: Platycorynus azureus is a species of leaf beetle of the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Senegal, and Guineahttp://www.chrysomelidae.it/afr_Eum/Platycorynus%20azureus.html observed by Sahlberg in 1829. ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Taxa named by Johan Reinhold Sahlberg Category:Beetles described in 1829
title: Platycorynus azureus
